resources.string: How can I on or off my alarm?
How can I update or delete my remainder?
How can I add my remainder?
How do I transfer my tasks from one device to another?
Did not find the answer to your questions?

string-array.name: string_array_on_off
string-array.item: Please click On button to On Alarm
Please click Off button to Off Alarm

string-array.name: string_array_update_delete
string-array.item: Please swap Right to update or delete Remainder

string-array.name: string_array_priority
string-array.item: Please click round shape plus button for priority
In low priority, few specific button does not work such as only vibrate works, ring does not work
In high priority all button work properly

string-array.name: string_array_remainder
string-array.item: Please click round shape add button to add remainder
In Title, you type your Remainder title
In Description, you type your Remainder description
Please click save button to save your Remainder details

string-array.name: string_array_transfer
string-array.item: Please click share button to transfer your task
